item.description:

item.title: Black scientist has white man's voice
item.dc:creator: Krevan88
item.description:
I have no problem with any of the voice acting so far. Being that it is an unfunded mod that the devs took their spare time to make, I think it’s pretty spot on. Definitely would like to see someone else do better with no budget.

Read full topic
item.source: Black scientist has white man's voice

item.title: Black scientist has white man's voice
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Maybe he had a black daddy and a white momma (or vice versa), got a problem with that? lol

Eli on the other hand, his voice does sound way off.

You go out and find someone who sounds exactly like Robert Guillaume.

Fuck, I thought they were lucky enough to find Kevin and Mike in a 6 year time span.

Read full topic

item.title: Black scientist has white man's voice
item.dc:creator: Paz_Ortega_Andrade
item.description:
Personally, I don’t think that this is a serious issue. It is possible for a white man to have a voice that is typical for a black man, and vice versa. These things usually don’t depend on a color of one’s skin.

This wasn’t a problem for me anyway
